name: Ratatöskr - Demo
description:
Ratatöskr is a special squirrel, living in the world tree yggdrassil. The main task of ratatöskr is to deliver messages from the great eagle at the top of the tree, to the dragon living within its roots and vise versa. This was his normal live, until something changed and the resulting message gets the most important in ratatöskrs life. 

- English and german language support - some parts maybe arent fully translated
